title: Why can't we report people in champ select?
body: I don't understand why we can't report them if they are being abusive, only for someone to dodge. They'll never get banned that way.

replies.body:
Champion Select reporting is an idea Riot are exploring. There was a post a couple weeks ago about it.
They also exploring Team Builder - Ranked as a way to stop arguments about lanes/roles.

http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/04/red-post-collection-tentative.html#3

Also the new banning system is supposed to be being implemented in OCE by the end of the month.
We're in OCE bro, they don't get banned anyway
